title-group.article-title: The Evaluation of the Energy Released During Preflame Reactions

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1954, Society of Automotive Engineers, Inc.

abstract.p: AN improved method, applicable to either motored or fired engines, for evaluating energyrelease rate occurring during preflame reactions is described in this paper. A unique feature of this method is the use of a mechanical computer to handle calculations. A smooth energy-release-rate curve can be obtained with this improved analysis technique â€“ something not possible with two previous methods. However, the mean rate of energy release as determined by all three methods is in general agreement.
